column2:
"Far too many ARKS members fail to take
advantage of the AC Shop, if you ask
me. I just don't understand it."

"After all, it's such a handy little shop.
All you have to do is select it from the
main menu, and there it is!"

"And what about you? You ought to go
take a look at the AC Shop, while we're
on the subject. Do it."

"Do what? Haven't you been listening?
Go to the AC Shop! They've got stuff there
you can't get anywhere else."
"Well, what are you waiting for? Get to it."
